channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: When Chasing More Dividends Leaves You With Less
item.description: High-yield equity funds are popular, but the pursuit of a large payout can sink your portfolio.

item.title: SEC fines Esmark, chairman over false tender offer for US Steel
Morgan Stanley Is Fined Over First Republic Insider Sales
item.description: Massachusetts securities regulator found several breakdowns in the bankâ€™s approval and monitoring of possible insider trading.

item.title: Adagio Therapeutics Stock Hits 52-Week Low at $0.84 Amid Challenges
Why Now May Be the Time to Invest in Small-Cap Stocks
item.description: Lower interest rates and a stabilizing economy could fuel a rally in smaller companies after years of lagging performance.

item.title: SunCoke Energy stock hits 52-week low at $8.04 amid market challenges
Pandemic Darling Moderna Needs a Reality Check
item.description: Moderna is spending aggressively to broaden the uses of its mRNA technology. Investors are losing patience.

item.title: Planet Fitness shares gain as BofA lifts target while maintaining a Buy
How Nvidia Became the Market's Most Important Stock, in Charts
item.description: The graphics chipmaker lost nearly $280 billion in market value Tuesday, the most ever by a company in a single session.

item.title: War crimes court ends proceedings against late Hamas leader Haniyeh
